pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Stalagmite Valley in $(6)Mining Paradise$().$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Agressive after you attack them.$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() Nothing, What did the dinos do to you? You monster.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Dimetrodons are peaceful little reptilians who wander the Mining Paradise. They will simply wander through the Mining Paradise, giving the dimension just a little bit more of an atmosphere. Be wary though, if you attack a dimetrodon, it will bite back!
